title: Unilever
description: Unilever, a leading consumer goods company, is known for its vibrant blue color with the hexadecimal code 0F0E9A. This distinctive hue is featured prominently in the brand's identity and is reflective of its global reach and commitment to excellence. Detailed information and media assets, including this color usage, can be accessed through their official press resources at https://www.unilever.com/news/press-and-media/media-assets/.
